name: @leon8ix/gpmf-cwd
author: leon8ix
description: This is a simple setup for extracting the GPMF data from all GoPro footage in a directory for usage in After Effects as JSON. The hard parts are handled by the 'gpmf-extract' and 'gopro-telemetry' packages. This is just a setup for easy usage.

scripts.build:win: powershell -NoProfile -Command "New-Item -ItemType Directory -Force -Path dist | Out-Null; bun build ./index.ts --compile --outfile ./dist/gpmf-cwd.exe"
